data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Nothing is more eye-opening than learning about who you are. Learning about your ancestors, celebrating family traditions, embracing your culture, and understanding where you came from can open your eyes to how beautiful and unique you are. It can also give your a sense of self-worth and belonging. Life is hard. But back in the day, life was even more so. More likely than not, your past family members probably faced terrible tragedies and heartache. But they did overcome them. And learning about their stories and how they got through difficult times can definitely give you the courage you need to keep going and make you more resilient when you're facing challenges. Due to the reasons outlined above, I think it's rather important for people to know who their ancestors were and learn about their stories. (135字)
data.referenceText: Do you think it's important for people to know who their ancestors were? Why or why not?
data.referenceTranslate: 你认为让人们知道他们的祖先是谁重要吗?为什么或为什么不?
